scripts.build: parcel build -d doc/$npm_package_version --public-url ./$npm_package_version src/index.html && mv doc/$npm_package_version/index.html doc/
scripts.build:full: parcel build -d doc/$npm_package_version --public-url ./$npm_package_version src/index.html --no-minify && mv doc/$npm_package_version/index.html doc/
scripts.publish: aws --profile global s3 sync doc s3://$npm_package_s3_bucket/ --acl public-read
